page.title: 08LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: In the Collingham area we reached the conclusion that on average people watched 16 hours of T.V. a week .This means that they have time to do other leisure pursuits.Some people who are active choose to do sporting pursuits. Of the people we interviewed 20% played soccer.Cricket,tennis,squash, and golf were played by 15% of the population.Fishing was enjoyed by 7% of the population.No rugby or athletics took place in the area. There is a cricket ground which uses the squash club as its pavilion.There are seperate tennis courts .Fishing takes place at the river Wharfe.For the people who prefer to stay inside to carry out their pastimes computing is quite a popular hobby.Some of the population went to social clubs.most people found plenty of time to go to the pub.
